channel.title: Making My Self Co
channel.description:
Right on my server when it was reapage scape, people signed on as "i 2h g0d i" Or "annowins" And they are co
How do i do this and do it to other peoples
Thanks. ( i wanna do it back to the nerd who messed up my server ) -Cheznee

item.title: Making My Self Co
item.dc:creator: @pk_man_owned pk_man_owned
item.description:
@pk_man_owned wrote:

Right on my server when it was reapage scape, people signed on as "i 2h g0d i" Or "annowins" And they are co

How do i do this and do it to other peoples

Thanks.
( i wanna do it back to the nerd who messed up my server )
-Cheznee

Ok you have the same source as me, so basically go into client.java and client.cfg and replace The Reaper with your name, do the same in Server.java and Server.cfg.

Ok now that you´re done with that your either going to want to remove the names manually by looking for them and deleting them in the player.java files and login.java files, or you can replace the names with your friend´s names or characters, or the last option which is make your own accounts and change the name to their´s. (that´s for 2h god nd w.e else)

The last thing your going to want to do is delete their rights manually by going into the characters files ( If im correct it´s the only one there named Characters) and to give mod or admin, it already comes in the source.

For the ::giveco here you go http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,254715.0.html all credit goes to 0wned_pl0x for command codes.

Oh yeah one last thing… I don´t think it´ll work, but… you can just ::ipban them…

Read full topic

item.title: Making My Self Co
item.dc:creator: @public_boolean public boolean
item.description:
@public_boolean wrote:

Go into character files and make the person player rights to 3-4 i think, if there no character files, its in player.java or login.java.

Read full topic

item.title: Making My Self Co
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:3, topic:263239”]You can’t unless there server is coded with it in there.

For example, their source might have something coded in it that says:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("The Reaper X") { playerRights = 3; }

And it will automatically change their rights to 3, whatever their name may be. (that rhymed.)[/quote]
Or maybe not all the character files are deleted. o.O

Read full topic
